Styles

The attributes that make up the City of Guelph branding

Styles are guidelines for core City of Guelph brand attributes, organized by category. These are descriptions of conventions that cut across component and suggest the rules that go into building/designing components and their treatment. Like the guidelines, each of these pages is effectively a reference article on how to use and approach the specific subject area.

  • Color

    Color styles define how color is used in the design system.

  • Typography

    Typography style description

  • Iconography

    How to style or construct icons for the Guelph design system

  • Motion

    How the style guide uses motion to enhance the user experience.
